about-us-text: This property features a restaurant, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor pool and a bar. It offers family rooms and a terrace. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free Wi-Fi.
goldenFleeceDescr: Located in Kutaisi, 4.9 km from WhiteBridge, Hotel Golden Fleece provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a terrace and a bar
cakeClubDescr: Сonfectionery Cake club is the best taste of traditional pastries made only from natural ingredients.
shedevriDescr: Shedevri offers you Georgian, traditional dishes, high quality, and guarantees the best taste!
tomasDescr: This is family winery, where already 50 year we are doing wine by our family technologies.
youthParkDescr: Youth park is 3.5 km south from Colchis fountain along Chavchavadze avenue. Circumference is 1.4 km. Large by Kutaisi standards and excellent for running and to some extent cycling.
tennisCourtDescr: A modern sports complex for adults and children (4+), where all the necessary conditions for a full-fledged training process of a tennis player are created.
shengeliaStadiumDescr: It is a multi-use stadium in Kutaisi, used mostly for football matches. It is the home stadium of FC Torpedo Kutaisi. The stadium is able to hold 12,000 people.
roomsAbout: With breathtaking views, exceptional design inspired by nature and sumptuous amenities – our premium mountain suites offer a memorable experience unlike anywhere else in Greece.
bookToday: Book your escape to Grand Forest Metsovo today
bookDirect: Book direct for the best price, exclusive offers and no hidden fees.
enjoy: Book direct and enjoy the lowest rates available!
bookEnjoy: Book direct and enjoy exclusive offers
extraFees: Many websites charge extra fees for bookings, we do not.
wakeUp: Wake up to the breathtaking beauty of the Pindus mountains.
aboutUsTitle: Some places are so good to stay in, you don’t want to generate a rush on them. The Grand Forest hotel in Metsovo is one of them.
gastronomyDescription: Experience modern local dishes and breathtaking views at our signature restaurant, Metsovo 1350m, where the menu is created by executive consultant chef Gikas Xenakis.
experienceDescription: All of our experiences are tailored to each individual guest – ensuring you’ll remember them for a lifetime. From skiing to wild truffle hunting, the surrounding landscape offers an array of activities for all four seasons.
spaDescription: Discover tranquillity beyond compare at the Fountus Spa, where wellness is generously offered in an elegant environment.
name: Your name
